english.segment1: (Chrous). I'm walking in authority, living life without apology. It's not wrong, dear, I belong here. So you might as well get used to me
english.segment2: (Verse 1). My mother may not be a queen. But my Father's King of everything. I'm adopted into the family. So I guess that makes me royalty
english.segment3: (Bridge). And He's given me dominion yes (oh). Power over men, them yes (oh). Everything I do is blessed (oh). Promised me some great success (oh). I am the authority (oh). God of the majority (oh). Livin' in my liberty (oh). So you might as well get used to me
english.segment4: (Chrous). I'm walking in authority, living life without apology. It's not wrong, dear, I belong here. So you might as well get used to me
english.segment5: (Verse 2). We're children of the most-high God. Understand and believe His word. We never have to beg or plead. For our Father will supply our needs
english.segment6: (Chrous). I'm walking in authority, living life without apology. It's not wrong, dear, I belong here. So you might as well get used to me
english.segment7: I'm walking in prosperity, living life the way it's meant to be. It's not wrong, dear, I belong here. So you might as well get used to me
english.segment8: Get something in your hand. And wave it in the air. 1 2 3 (oh). 1 2 3 (oh). 1 2 3 (oh). So you might as well get used to me
